games.summary: Jalen Johnson had 29 points, 12 rebounds and 12 assists to lead the Atlanta Hawks to a 130-123 win over the Cleveland Cavaliers in an NBA Cup game on Friday night. Nickeil Alexander-Walker added 28 points, including a clutch late 3-pointer, helping Atlanta go on an 7-0 run in less than 30 seconds to create separation.

Tyrese Maxey scored 22 points, Jared McCain had 20 off the bench and the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Brooklyn Nets 115-103 on Friday night in an NBA Cup game. Egor Demin scored a career-high 23 points, and Tyrese Martin had 16 for Brooklyn.
blurbs: 🆕 Ziaire Williams (BKN) made his first start of the season. 30 min, 10 pts.
📋 Quentin Grimes (PHI) made just his 3rd start this season. 19 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- — Brandon Miller scored 27 points, Miles Bridges had 22 points, eight rebounds and seven assists and the Charlotte Hornets beat the Chicago Bulls 123-116 on Friday night to snap a seven-game losing streak.

Desmond Bane scored 37 points and grabbed two crucial offensive rebounds as the Orlando Magic defeated the Detroit Pistons 112-109 on Friday night to win their NBA Cup group. The Magic overcame a triple-double by the Pistons' Cade Cunningham , who finished with 39 points, 12 rebounds and 11 assists.

Pascal Siakam had 24 points and 11 rebounds and the Indiana Pacers beat the Washington Wizards 119-86 on Friday night in an NBA Cup game between two of the league's worst teams. McConnell had 14 points and eight assists to help Indiana end a three-game losing streak and improve to 3-16.
blurbs: 📋 Jay Huff (IND) made just his 3rd start this season. 12 pts, 6 reb.

games.summary: Jalen Brunson scored 37 points and the New York Knicks advanced to the knockout round of the NBA Cup, beating the Milwaukee Bucks 118-109 on Friday night in Giannis Antetokounmpo 's return from a groin injury. Mikal Bridges scored 14 points as the Knicks shot 44%.
blurbs: 📋 Josh Hart (NY) made just his 3rd start this season. 19 pts, 15 reb.
⬆️ Gary Harris (MIL) played 24 min (season avg: 12). 5 pts, 0 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 37 points and eight assists and the Oklahoma City Thunder held on to beat the Phoenix Suns 123-119 on Friday night to reach the knockout round of the NBA Cup. Gilgeous-Alexander has scored at least 20 points in 92 consecutive games, matching Wilt Chamberlain for the second-longest streak in NBA history.
blurbs: 📋 Collin Gillespie (PHX) made just his 2nd start this season. 24 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Devin Vassell scored a season-high 35 points on the strength of 7-of-9 shooting from 3-point range and the San Antonio Spurs advanced to the NBA Cup quarterfinals with a 139-136 win over the Denver Nuggets on Friday night.
blurbs: 📋 Spencer Jones (DEN) made just his 3rd start this season. 9 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: Keyonte George scored 31 points and Lauri Markkanen added 28 to help the Utah Jazz snap a four-game skid with a 128-119 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Friday night. Russell Westbrook , the NBA leader in triple-doubles, had the 206th of his career with 16 points, a season-high 14 assists and 12 rebounds for Sacramento, which went winless in four NBA Cup games.
blurbs: ⬆️ Brice Sensabaugh (UTAH) played 28 min (season avg: 16). 20 pts, 3 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: Austin Reaves scored 38 points, Luka Doncic added 35 points and 11 assists in his third meeting with his former team, and the Lakers spoiled Anthony Davis ' return to Los Angeles with a 129-119 victory over the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night. Reaves scored 19 points and Doncic added 17 in an impressive second half, allowing the Lakers to hold on for their sixth consecutive victory.
blurbs: 🆕 Ryan Nembhard (DAL) made his first start of the season. 23 min, 17 pts.

games.summary: INGLEWOOD, Calif. scored 16 points and Santi Aldama added 13 off the bench for the Grizzlies, who have a three-game road winning streak after dropping their previous five away from home.
